About the Bar

Shooters bar has comfortable seating and gentle lighting with an inviting atmosphere and background music.

Check out the gallery to see for yourself

The Booths

The booths are in a separate room and were designed to enable a group of friends to be able to have a private area for the evening where you can hang up your coats and bags, kick back and relax and have fun.

You can upgrade to a drinks/accessories package and if you do each booth has a buzzer system so you wonâ€™t have to go to the bar when you are ready for your next round of drinks. (Minimum of 4 persons and a maximum of 10 in each booth.
